name: Treasures of Grinda - Early First Demo!
name_original: Treasures of Grinda - Early First Demo!
description:
(Developer's Note: Development currently on hold, project will get rolling soon as possible! The demo does not represent final product)

Journey for treasures chests and face the dangers! (and goblins.)

Treasures of Grinda: Dungeon Master is small project crafted by students with interest towards game development. It's a 2D platformer powered by retro charm and old-school sorcery. Demo contains first available level containing 3 maps and simple boss room!

HOW TO PLAY (PC)

  • ARROW KEYS: Movement
  • Q: Main Weapon (Sword)
  • W: Secondary Weapon
  • E: Use consumable (Potion)
  • SPACE: Jump
  • UP: Open chest
  • Hold down: Hop down from the bridge platform!
  • ESC: Pause Menu
